title: Canyonlands National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Canyonlands National Park Founders Day Celebration      Time: 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Moab Information Center - corner of Center and Main streets, Moab Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Join rangers from Arches, Canyonlands, Hovenweep, and Natural Bridges at the Moab Information Center at the corner of Center and Main streets as we celebrate the 100th anniversary of the National Park Service. View Details      Canyonlands National Park Art in the Parks      Time: 8:00 AM to 12:30 PM Location: The Needles  Fees: Free     Friday, August 26, 2016 Join Community Artist in the Parks Maddie Logowitz at The Needles. Bring your art supplies, or just come to chat. View Details      Canyonlands National Park Celebrate the Stars      Time: 8:30 PM to 10:30 PM Location: Island in the Sky Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Join rangers at Island in the Sky at Canyonlands National Park as we explore our night skies. A short interpretive program will be followed by telescope viewing. View Details
